content.question: The image was created most directly in response to

choices.label: social reform efforts by settlement-house workers
poll taxes and literacy tests that blocked African Americans from voting
the power gained by urban political machines
the exclusion of women from voting

content.answer: the power gained by urban political machines

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
